channel.title: Hayday - News
channel.description: RSS wrapper of Hayday inbox News

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 5!
item.description: January ends and February begins! Are you ready for more fun Events!? Monday: Spin The Wheel (1 Puzzle Piece Guaranteed, Possibility for 2) Tuesday: Truck Orders (2x Coins) Wednesday: Boat Orders (2x XP) Thursday: Farm Visitors (2x Coins) Friday: Fishing: Lobsters and Lures 30% + Farm Pass Points Bonus (2x Farm Pass points) Saturday and Sunday : Global Fishing Event All events start at 8AM UTC For more details on each event, please go to the event board! Have an amazing week! #HayDay

item.title: Hay Day Events - Changes!
item.description: Hello Farmers! On Sunday, 11 February, we will have a Truck order 2x XP Event together with the Animal Feed Event! Start time: Sunday, 11 February 8 am UTC End time: Monday, 12 February 8 am UTC

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 7
item.description: Hey Farmers! Another week of February is here! Are you excited!? Monday: Spin The Wheel Event (Extra Voucher) Tuesday: Truck Orders Event (2X Coins) Wednesday: Boat Orders Event (2X XP) Thursday: Town Visitor Event (Extra Barn & Silo Upgrade Materials for 2+3 Buildings) Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Duck Salon and Net Maker, 30% boost) + Farm Pass Points Bonus (2X farm pass points) Saturday-Sunday: Global Boat Event All events start at 8AM UTC For more details on each event, please go to the event board! Have an amazing week! #HayDay

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 8
item.description: It's almost the end of February! Are you ready for more awesome Events!? Monday: Spin the Wheel Event (1 Land Expansion Permit Guaranteed, Possibility for 2) Tuesday: Truck Orders Event (Extra Voucher) Wednesday: Boat Orders Event (Extra Puzzles) Thursday: Town Visitors Event (2X Coins) Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Lobster Pool and Lure Maker, 30% boost) + Farm Pass Points Bonus (2X farm pass points) Saturday: Farm Visitor Event (Yard Sale) Sunday: Production Building Boost Event (All Buildings, 20% Boost) All events start at 8AM UTC For more details on each event, please go to the event board! Have an amazing week! #HayDay

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 9
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 9

Last week of February and March says hello! Are you ready for some great Events!? Monday: Spin the Wheel Event (1 Puzzle Piece Guaranteed, Possibility for 2) Tuesday: Truck Order Event (2X XP) Wednesday: Boat Event (2X Coins) Thursday: Town Visitor Event ( 2x XP + Reputation) Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (20% boost all buildings) Saturday: Town Visitors Event (2x Coins) + Truck Order Event (2x XP) Sunday: Trees/Bushes Time Percent (3 randomised bushes produce fruits at 2x speed) + Boat Event (Extra Puzzle Pieces) All events start at 8AM UTC For more details on each event, please go to the event board! Have an amazing week!

item.title: Dairy News: New Update, St. Patrick's Day, Easter and more!
Hay Day Events Week 10
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 10

Get ready, farmers, for a new month of Weekly Events! Don your overalls and let`s go! â€“ All Events kick off at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game. Monday: Spin the Wheel (Extra Vouchers) Tuesday: Truck Order Event (Extra Barn & Silo Upgrade Materials) Wednesday: Boat Event (Extra Boosters) Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2x Coins) Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Duck Salon and Net Maker, 30% ) + Farmpass Double Points and Global Helping Event (Int Womans Day) Saturday: Town Visitors Event (2x XP & Reputation) + Global Helping Event (Int Womans Day) Sunday: Crop Boost Event (3 Crops instead of 2, 3 random crops) + Global Helping Event (Int Womans Day)

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 11
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 11

Get ready, farmers, for the next volume of Weekly Events! All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game. Monday: Spin the Wheel Event (1 Land Expansion Permit Guaranteed, Possibility for 2) Tuesday: Truck Order Event (Extra Vouchers) Wednesday: Boat Event (2x Coins) Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (Yard Sale) Friday: Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Lobster Pool and Lure Workbench, 30% boost) + Double Farm Pass Points Saturday: Town Visitors Event (Extra Land Expansion Materials for 2+3 Buildings) + Global Boat Event (St. Patricks Day) Sunday: Farm Visitors (2x Coins) + Global Boat Event (St. Patricks Day)

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 12
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 12

Hello farmers! A new week of Events is waiting for you! All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game.

Monday: Spin The Wheel (1 Puzzle Piece Guaranteed, Possibility for 2) Tuesday: Truck Order Event (Extra Land Expansion Materials) Wednesday: Boat Event (2x Coins) Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2X XP) Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (All Buildings, 20% Boost) + Double Farmpass Points Saturday: Town Visitor Event (Extra Barn & Silo Upgrade Materials for 2 + 3 Buildings) + Truck Order Event (2X Coins) Sunday: Production Building Boost Event (3 Random Buildings, 20% Boost) + Boat Event (2X Coins)

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 13!
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 13

Hello farmers! The last week of Events in March! All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game.

Monday: Spin The Wheel (Extra Vouchers) Tuesday: Truck Order Event (2x XP) Wednesday: Boat Event (2x Coins) Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2X Coins) Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Duck Salon and Net Maker, 30%) Saturday: Town Visitor Event (2X Coins) + Truck Order Event (Extra Barn & Silo Upgrade Materials) Sunday: Animal Feed Time Percent (3 random types of animals feed produced) + Boat Event (2x Coins)

item.title: Dairy News: All the new content coming in April
Youtube Milestone Info
item.description:
Join the Youtube Milestone Challenge to get amazing rewards!

We are close to reaching 2 million subscribers on our YouTube channel! To celebrate, we've prepared a thrilling challenge for you.

For every 20,000 new friends who join us, we're sprinkling in-game rewards all the way up to our goal. If we reach the final milestone (2M subscribers), the enchanting Flower Bulbs decoration will be yours to claim.

Keep an eye on your inbox to track our progress towards this milestone, and when it's time to collect your rewards, head over to the shop. You'll find them waiting as free items, just a scroll past the Farm Pass offers.

Let's grow together! ðŸŒ¼ðŸŽ‰

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 14
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 14

Hello farmers! The first week of Events in April! All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game.

Monday: Spin The Wheel (Puzzle Piece) + Double Farm Pass Points Tuesday: Truck Order Event (Extra Land Expansions) Wednesday: Boat Event (Extra Vouchers) Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2X Coins) Friday: Fishing Production Buildings Event (20% faster) + Double Farm Pass Points Saturday: Town Visitor Event (2X Coins) + Ramadan Global Truck Event Sunday: Fruit boost (3 random types of trees or bushes will produce twice as fast) + Ramadan Global Truck Event

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 15!
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 15

Hello farmers! Another week full of Events in April! All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game. Monday: Spin The Wheel (Extra Vouchers) Tuesday: Town Visitors ( Extra Barn & Silo Upgrade Materials for 2 + 3 Buildings) Wednesday: Boat Event (Extra Boosters) Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2X Coins) Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Duck Salon 30% boost) + Double Farm Pass Points Saturday: Town Visitor Event + Truck Order Event 2x XP Sunday: Crop Boost Event (3 Crops instead of 2, 3 random crops) + Yard Sale

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 16!
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 16!

Good Morning farmers! Welcome to our Garden Weekl! All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game. Monday: Spin the Wheel Event (1 Land Expansion Permit Guaranteed, Possibility for 2) Tuesday: Truck Order Event (Extra Vouchers) + Cherry Tree x2 Wednesday: Boat Event (2x Coins) Thursday: Farm Visitors (2x Coins) + Apple Tree x2 Friday: Fish Production Lobster and Lures 30% + Garden Helping Event + 2x Farmpass Points Saturday: Town Visitors Event (Extra Land Expansion Materials for 2+3 Buildings) + Garden Helping Event Sunday: Production Building Boost Event (3 Random Buildings, 20% Boost) + Garden Helping Event

item.title: Visitor Milestone Info
item.description:
Join the Visitor Milestone Challenge to get the Crescent Gazebo!

Esteemed farmers, your diligent efforts in dispatching numerous trucks have been commendable. Regrettably, despite your endeavors, the Crescent Gazebo decoration eluded our grasp. But another golden opportunity presents itself! Serve a grand total of 50 million visitors today and tomorrow. Should we achieve this ambitious goal, the majestic Crescent Gazebo decoration will be yours for free!

Mark your calendars, for after we reach the goal, it shall be available in the shop on Saturday as a token of our collective effort. Let us unite; together, we can do it!

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 17!
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 17!

Hello farmers! Not much left of April, but we have another week full of Events! All Events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each Event by visiting our Event Board in the game.

Monday: Spin The Wheel (1 Puzzle Piece Guaranteed, Possibility for 2)

Tuesday: Truck Order Event (Extra Land Expansion Materials)

Wednesday: Boat Event (Extra Vouchers)

Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2x Coins)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (All Fish 20% boost) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (Extra Barn & Silo Upgrade Materials) + Truck Order Event (2x Coins)

Sunday: Animal Feed Time Percent (3 random types of animals feed produced)+ Boat Event (2x Coins)

Have a great week!

item.title: New Supercell game going global!
item.description:
To celebrate the global release of Squad Busters, all Supercell games are giving away free and exclusive rewards for each milestone the community achieves.

How it works

Pre-Register for Squad Busters on the App Store or Google Play before the global release on the 29th of May. By pre-registering you will get the game right away when it becomes globally available on the App Store or Google Play.

Follow the progress of the community effort on the reward tracker and don't forget to claim the rewards as they unlock.

Progress updated daily.

Squad up and make sure to tell your friends!

ðŸ‘‰App store linkðŸ‘ˆ

What is Squad Busters?

Squad Busters is a game where you can play with your favorite Supercell characters in fun and action-packed matches. Travel through different worlds, collect new characters, and evolve them to take down massive monsters as you continually build your ultimate squad.

Currently available in Canada, Spain, Mexico, Finland, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, and Singapore, Squad busters will release worldwide on May 29th.

ðŸ“º [EMBEDDED VIDEO]
